Package org.apfloat.calc

Class AbstractCalculatorImpl

java.lang.Object
org.apfloat.calc.AbstractCalculatorImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, CalculatorImpl
Direct Known Subclasses:
FunctionCalculatorImpl
public abstract class AbstractCalculatorImpl extends Object implements CalculatorImpl, Serializable
Basic calculator implementation. Provides a storage for variables, and maps the elementary operators to function calls.
Version:
1.9.1
Author:
Mikko Tommila
See Also:
Serialized Form
